manual_device.title: Manual Device Setup
manual_device.description: Enter your device information manually. You can find the serial number, device password, and MQTT prefix on a sticker on your device or through tools like libdyson-rest and opendyson. Leave IP Address blank for automatic discovery via mDNS. Select device categories and capabilities to customize your device setup.

init.title: Dyson Device Management
init.description: Manage your Dyson devices and connection settings.

manage_devices.title: Account Management
manage_devices.description:
Manage {device_count} devices in your Dyson account ({account_email}).

{active_count} devices are currently active.

üí° Individual devices can be reloaded/deleted using Home Assistant's native controls on each device page.

Select an account-level action:

reload_all.title: Reload All Devices
reload_all.description:
This will reload all {active_count} active devices out of {device_count} total devices, refreshing their connection and state information.

Any temporary connection issues may be resolved. Continue?

delete_device.title: Remove Device
delete_device.description:
This will permanently remove {device_name} ({device_serial}) from Home Assistant.

Status: {device_status}

All entities for this device will be deleted. You can re-add it later by reloading the account entry.

set_sleep_timer.description: Set a sleep timer for the device. The device will turn off after the specified time.

cancel_sleep_timer.description: Cancel the currently active sleep timer for the device.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Dyson device to cancel the sleep timer for.

schedule_operation.description: Schedule a future operation for the device.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Dyson device to schedule the operation for.

schedule_time.description: When to execute the operation (ISO 8601 format).
